author: hjbossi
body:
#### PR description:

Fix to PYTHIA 8 photon flux [PR #43840](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43840) that was discovered when creating the backport. Fix is included both here and in the subsequent backports (see for example [PR #44259](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/44259)). 

#### PR validation:

The modifications in this PR were tested both by myself and @stahlleiton.
title: Fix to PYTHIA 8 photon flux.
